com.io7m.r2.filters

Class R2FilterCompositorItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.io7m.r2.filters.R2FilterCompositorItem

    @Generated(value={"Immutables.generator","R2FilterCompositorItemType"})
public final class R2FilterCompositorItem
extends Object
implements R2FilterCompositorItemType
    A single texture that will be rendered to some subset of the current viewport.
